info.title: UnBusy OpenApi Documentation
info.description: UnBusy is a small public transport application

get.description: Logs the user in and returns the access token. Needed for write/delete requests

requestBody.description: The email and password of the user

get.summary: Get a list of all buses

requestBody.description: Bus object that needs to be added

parameters.name: bus
parameters.description: ID of the bus that needs to be deleted

post.summary: Updates the current location of a bus
post.description: Updates the current location of a bus

requestBody.description: The key, longitude and latitude of the update

204.description: Bus line location updated successfully, busLocationUpdateEvent dispatched

get.description: Returns a collection of bus lines

post.description: Returns the newly created bus line

get.description: Returns a single bus line object identified by its ID

parameters.name: busLine
parameters.description: ID of the bus line to retrieve

delete.description: Delete a specific bus line by its ID

parameters.name: busLine
parameters.description: ID of the bus line to delete

get.description: Returns a single bus line schedule object identified by its ID

parameters.name: busLine
parameters.description: ID of the bus line to retrieve

post.description: Create a new schedule for a bus line

first_departure_time.description: The first departure time in format HH:mm:ss

last_departure_time.description: The last departure time in format HH:mm:ss

interval_in_minutes.description: The interval in minutes between departures

direction_name.description: The name of the direction for the schedule

day_type.description: The day type for the schedule

delete.description: Delete a specific bus line's schedule

parameters.name: busLine
parameters.description: ID of the bus line whose schedule to delete

get.description: Returns a collection of bus stops
Returns a single bus stop object identified by its ID

parameters.name: busStop
parameters.description: ID of the bus stop to retrieve

BusLine.title: Bus Line
BusLine.description: Bus Line and all of its stops in GeoJSON format

BusSchedule.title: Bus Schedule
BusSchedule.description: Bus Schedule for a specific bus line

BusStop.title: Bus Line
BusStop.description: Bus Stop and all of its lines in GeoJSON format

message.example: The type field is required. (and 1 more error)

id.description: The unique identifier of the bus.

bus_line_id.description: The ID of the bus line that this bus belongs to.
